message:
Currently this is the only free "hosted" .NET CI server for private projects (not OSS) that I know of. Happy to be corrected though.

More at http://tfs.visualstudio.com
name: Pricing Information - Team Foundation Service
caption: tfs.visualstudio.com
description: Yes, you can sign up for the Free Plan today and start using the service for free even with more than 5 users. We will provide guidance on how you can transition to a paid plan in 2013 if your needs are no longer met by the Free Plan at that time.
